name: Low ISO Labs
description:
A game made for the Simple jam #3 with the theme of "guns."

Low ISO labs is a small platforming game where the player uses their weapons to progress through each level. Due to the lack of time and the denial of some scope creep there are only two. Firstly, the AirGun. using the arrow keys to shoot in any direction causes a burst of air to fire out this has a lot of recoil and when shot down can be used as a double jump. Second and finally, the HandGun/blaster (idk the name) shooting it in any direction causes a hand to shoot out, whos hand? I don't know that either but when shooting it at a switch it'll flip the switch!

All of the art sound effects, and most of the code were made by yours truly. The music was made by Tim Beek and is from their dystopian pack.
